verbs.description: [V: remembering] [ARG1: when the lights went out in 1965] it was at the time the largest power failure in history and it struck at the evening rush hour more than 800 000 riders were trapped in the subway brooklyn city power vandalism boston new yorkers peter kihss national guardsmen albany new york buffalo new york manhattan
